description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	Bugs
  30401   NullReferenceException on accessing the presentation
  32852   Rotated text in smartart object
  29050   Custom options for series are not rendered
  32098   Exception while loading PPTX
  28758   Some types of Charts are not rendered
  31893   SmartArt shape rendered in inverted manner in generated thumbnail
  32141   ShowPercentage issue with chart labels
  32661   AddClone is not working
  30886   Images failed to get rendered in exported PDF using .NET 4.0 dll
  32169   PPT to PDF conversion chart labels issue
  32127   Slide text missing in Thumbnail
  32087   Smart-art object text align bug
  32429   Wrong text rendering position
  32079   Small gradient difference
  31827   Wrong XML comment for ShapeEx.ThreeDFormat
  31891   PPTX throws exception in printing
  29678   NullReferenceException on accessing presentations with SmartArt
  29780   InvalidCastException on opening presentation with SmartArts
  30445   Charts missing in exported PDF
  30251   Missing XML comments for publicly visible types and members
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET 5.8.0
